item.title: Artificial intelligence
item.description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is a really interesting subject because a lot of people think that we will be soon able to develop this amazing technology. People are scared to see machine that can respond like us and are capable to beat us. A lot of science-fiction movies are made from that and descride how humans are feared to see machines can control the whole world. But does this really works ?
